EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-03-09-Turbofest-Silicon-Valley.ES-2016-03-08 Final Reminder.EMAIL-Final
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.first name}}'s Turbofest Details | Comedian T.J. Miller Announced
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/groups/turbofest-silicon-valley-2016?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Turbofest-SV&utm_content=030816]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Tomorrow is the day. Visit the #VMTurbofest Silicon Valley 2016 <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/groups/turbofest-silicon-valley-2016?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Turbofest-SV&utm_content=030816]]> Green Circle Community group and take the pre-event poll, enter our Best TurboTweet Contest, and get a sneak-preview of some of the awesomeness to come.
#VMTurbofest Details | Agenda <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-2293?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Turbofest-SV&utm_content=030816]]> Wednesday March, 9, 2016 {{my.Turbofest Silicon Valley:default=Save The Date}} Amazon Web Services Pop-Up Loft 925 Market Street, San Francisco, CA 94103
- From 8:00AM to 12:00PM at the Hilton Union Square we are hosting meetings with our executives. If you would like to schedule a meeting, please contact Kelsey Hill, kelsey.hill@vmturbo.com <[[mailto:kelsey.hill@vmturbo.com]]>
- Registration begins at 12:15 PM on Floor 3 of the Amazon Web Services Loft where all registered guests will receive a commemorative Turbofest Silicon Valley 2016 messenger bag
- Turbofest will start promptly at 1:00 PM and full agenda can be accessed in the Green Circle - Presentations end at 6:00 PM, followed by networking and cocktails - Everyone is asked to meet on Floor 3 at 7:45 PM to reserve your seat for T.J. Miller's performance at 8:00 PM
Please do not hesitate to reach out to us with any and all questions; our contact information can be found below.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
Jillian Fiumara Corporate Event Manager, VMTurbo Cell: 860.305.1239
Kelsey Hill Executive Assistant, VMTurbo Cell: 914.330.4210 Data Centers Change. So Do Comedians. We Keep Both Awesome.
<[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/groups/turbofest-silicon-valley-2016?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Turbofest-SV&utm_content=030816]]>
T.J. Miller Comedian Extraordinaire HBO's Silicon Valley & DEADPOOL
